statements.select:
DECLARE @RecordCount INT SELECT @RecordCount = COUNT(T1.WalT_ID) FROM EWM_WalletTrans T1 INNER JOIN EWM_Wallet T2 ON T2.Wal_ID = T1.WalT_Wal_ID AND T2.Wal_No = T1.WalT_Wal_No LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T31.AFC_ID 'CustomerID' , CASE T31.AFC_IsPlatform WHEN 1 THEN '平台内汽修商' WHEN 0 THEN '一般汽修商户' END 'CustomerType' , T31.AFC_Name 'CustomerName' , T31.AFC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo' , T31.AFC_Name 'AutoFactoryName' FROM PIS_AutoFactoryCustomer T31 WHERE T31.AFC_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T32.GC_ID 'CustomerID' , '普通客户' 'CustomerType' , T32.GC_Name 'CustomerName' , T32.GC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo' , NULL 'AutoFactoryName' FROM PIS_GeneralCustomer T32 WHERE T32.GC_IsValid = 1 ) T3 ON T3.CustomerID = T2.Wal_CustomerID AND T3.CustomerType = T2.Wal_OwnerTypeName WHERE T1.WalT_IsValid = 1
T1.WalT_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.WalT_Wal_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_Wal_No#+'%'
T1.WalT_Time BETWEEN #_TimeStart# AND #_TimeEnd# T1.WalT_Time >= #_TimeStart#
T1.WalT_Time <= #_TimeEnd#
T1.WalT_TypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_TypeName#+'%'
T1.WalT_RechargeTypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_RechargeTypeName#+'%'
T1.WalT_BillNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_BillNo#+'%'
T1.WalT_Remark LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_Remark#+'%'
T2.Wal_OwnerTypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_OwnerTypeName#+'%'
T2.Wal_CustomerName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_CustomerName#+'%'
T3.CustomerPhoneNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_CustomerPhoneNo#+'%'
T3.AutoFactoryName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_AutoFactoryName#+'%'
SELECT @RecordCount 'RecordCount' , T1.WalT_ID , T1.WalT_Org_ID , T1.WalT_Org_Name , T1.WalT_Wal_ID , T1.WalT_Wal_No , T1.WalT_Time , T1.WalT_TypeCode , T1.WalT_TypeName , T1.WalT_RechargeTypeCode , T1.WalT_RechargeTypeName , T1.WalT_ChannelCode , T1.WalT_ChannelName , T1.WalT_Amount , T1.WalT_BillNo , T1.WalT_Remark , T1.WalT_IsValid , T1.WalT_CreatedBy , T1.WalT_CreatedTime , T1.WalT_UpdatedBy , T1.WalT_UpdatedTime , T1.WalT_VersionNo , T2.Wal_Org_ID , T2.Wal_Org_Name , T2.Wal_OwnerTypeName , T2.Wal_OwnerTypeCode , T2.Wal_CustomerID , T2.Wal_CustomerName , T3.CustomerPhoneNo , T3.AutoFactoryName FROM EWM_WalletTrans T1 INNER JOIN EWM_Wallet T2 ON T2.Wal_ID = T1.WalT_Wal_ID AND T2.Wal_No = T1.WalT_Wal_No LEFT JOIN ( SELECT T31.AFC_ID 'CustomerID' , CASE T31.AFC_IsPlatform WHEN 1 THEN '平台内汽修商' WHEN 0 THEN '一般汽修商户' END 'CustomerType' , T31.AFC_Name 'CustomerName' , T31.AFC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo' , T31.AFC_Name 'AutoFactoryName' FROM PIS_AutoFactoryCustomer T31 WHERE T31.AFC_IsValid = 1 UNION SELECT T32.GC_ID 'CustomerID' , '普通客户' 'CustomerType' , T32.GC_Name 'CustomerName' , T32.GC_PhoneNo 'CustomerPhoneNo' , NULL 'AutoFactoryName' FROM PIS_GeneralCustomer T32 WHERE T32.GC_IsValid = 1 ) T3 ON T3.CustomerID = T2.Wal_CustomerID AND T3.CustomerType = T2.Wal_OwnerTypeName WHERE T1.WalT_IsValid = 1
T1.WalT_Org_ID LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_Org_ID#+'%'
T1.WalT_Wal_No LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_Wal_No#+'%'
T1.WalT_Time BETWEEN #_TimeStart# AND #_TimeEnd# T1.WalT_Time >= #_TimeStart#
T1.WalT_Time <= #_TimeEnd#
T1.WalT_TypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_TypeName#+'%'
T1.WalT_RechargeTypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_RechargeTypeName#+'%'
T1.WalT_BillNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_BillNo#+'%'
T1.WalT_Remark LIKE '%'+#WHERE_WalT_Remark#+'%'
T2.Wal_OwnerTypeName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_OwnerTypeName#+'%'
T2.Wal_CustomerName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_Wal_CustomerName#+'%'
T3.CustomerPhoneNo LIKE '%'+#WHERE_CustomerPhoneNo#+'%'
T3.AutoFactoryName LIKE '%'+#WHERE_AutoFactoryName#+'%'
ORDER BY T1.WalT_UpdatedTime DESC
OFFSET ( #PageIndex# - 1 ) * #PageSize# ROWS FETCH NEXT #PageSize# ROWS ONLY
